text: Selargius (Ceràxius) is a town and comune (municipality) in the Metropolitan City of Cagliari in Sardinia, Italy. As of 2016, 28,938 people lived there. Its area is 26.67 km². It is 11 meters above sea level. == References == == Other websites == * Category:Communes of the Metropolitan City of Cagliari
title: Selargius
